question: Select the most suitable word to fill in the blank
q: Why do people keep cats as pets? {you,your,yours,you're} would agree that cats are excellent companions. {Them,They,Their,These,Those} are playful, intelligent and loving animals. Cats let {them,they,their,this,that} owners know that they are happy by rewarding {them,they,their,thus,those} with a loud rumbling purr or  alick on the arm.
